doc.title: Fatty Cheong's Char Siew: To get good Charsiew, you need to know a little pig anatomy!
doc.text: Our/PRP$ Kakis/JJ have/VBN been/VBN raving/VBG about/IN Meng/NNP Kee/NNP Charsiew/NNP which/WDT Wahcow/VBZ brought/VBN back/RB from/IN KL/NN and/CC were/VBD lamenting/RB why/WRB we/PRP ca/MD n't/RB get/VB Charsiew/NN which/WDT is/VBZ as/RB good/JJ here/RB ./. The/DT main/JJ characteristic/NN of/IN Meng/NNP Kee/NNP 's/POS Charsiew/NN is/VBZ that/IN it/PRP is/VBZ really/RB fatty/JJ and/CC they/PRP managed/VBD to/TO roast/NN it/PRP till/IN the/DT fats/NNS just/RB melts/VBN in/IN your/PRP$ mouth/NN ,/, so/RB you/PRP really/RB get/VB a/DT great/JJ flavourful/JJ and/CC tender/JJ Charsiew/NN ./. But/CC Singaporeans/NNP tend/NNP to/TO be/VB more/RB health/JJ conscious/NN ,/, so/RB many/JJ of/IN the/DT stalls/NNS here/RB sell/VB very/RB lean/JJ Charsiew/NN ./.
